resources.string: Cairo is the capital of Egypt. The city`s metropolitan area is one of the largest in Africa, the largest in the Middle East, and the 15th-largest in the world, Located near the Nile Delta
Cairo is located in northern Egypt
known as Lower Egypt, The city lies along the Nile River
It is associated with ancient Egypt, as the famous Giza pyramid, Cairo has the oldest and largest film and music industries in the Arab world, Al-Azhar University
